Item.sqlserver_body: CREATE NONCLUSTERED INDEX [IX_access_explicitdefine_source_id_related_id] ON [innovator].[ACCESS_EXPLICITDEFINE] ( [SOURCE_ID] ASC, [RELATED_ID] ASC ) INCLUDE ( [CAN_DEFINE_EXPLICITLY], [CAN_GET_ISDEFINED_EXPLICITLY], [CAN_UNDEFINE_EXPLICITLY] ) WITH (PAD_INDEX = OFF, STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF, SORT_IN_TEMPDB = OFF, DROP_EXISTING = OFF, ONLINE = OFF, ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON, ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON) ON [PRIMARY]
Item.name: IX_access_explicitdefine_source_id_related_id
